refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets a given row of a 2-dimensional array from a vector.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sets a given row of a 2-dimensional array. The output is an 2-d array with the contents of the requested row set to values of the input array (1-d; if 2-d the first row of the input array is used).

refsect1.title: Initialisation
refsect1.para: iout[] -- output array containing the set row. It will be created if it does not exist.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array containing the set row. It will be created if it does not exist.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: Here is an example of the setrow opcode. It uses the file rfft.csd.
